name: RWC Racing Vol 1
description:
RWC Racing Vol.1 is a car racing game with African themes and a fusion of familiar locations and landmarks in Ghana.
Africa’s number one game and highest-ranking game in graphics and lifelike gameplay.
Experience the thrill as we witness our well-known taxi, trotro and keke take on some of the world’s fanciest and fastest racing cars.

Enjoy the most addictive offline games in 2020
Just imagine that you are bored then you have an opportunity to finish your boring time with a car racing game. Even if you are at work you can play this game when you are tired. An important thing for you is that if you have no internet data connection or WIFI then this is the best offline racing game present for you.
● Real Competition
Real cars, real tracks, real traffic racing with epic drift stunts.
● Super Cars & Easy Controls
The big surprise for free nice cars and the test drive! Easy controls and great car selection
● Car Upgrades & Customize
Upgrade the turbo engine, find the optimal tune for your car. Colorful paints
● Best High-Quality Graphics
We made some Cool and smooth high-quality graphics to give you the best experience while playing game
● Different Game Environment
There are multiple game Tracks & maps for you to enjoy
